abstract: Hackers have been able to restore at least some functions on iPhones that had been disabled by last week’s Apple update.
snippet: Hackers have been able to restore at least some functions on iPhones that had been disabled by last week’s Apple update.
lead_paragraph: So it stretches the brain to think of Ethel Merman wearing a black turtleneck and jeans. Then again, “There’s No Business Like Show Business” could just as well have been written for Mr. Jobs.
